headline: Bank makes hundreds of millions in loans available to assist Helene recovery in North Carolina
summary: Truist Financial Corporation has announced that it is making hundreds of millions of dollars in loans available to residents, businesses and local governments affected by Hurricane Helene in North Carolina.  Meanwhile, state legislators have approved hundreds of millions of dollars in aid for Helene relief and recovery, while the governor’s office says more is needed.

headline: Truist to speak at the Goldman Sachs US Financial Services Conference
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced that Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Bill Rogers will speak at the Goldman Sachs 2024 US Financial Services Conference at 10:40 a.m. ET on Tuesday, Dec. 10, 2024, in New York City.
